title: SOP: E204 – Wire Break
summary: Safe procedure to restore production after wire break.
steps: Secure the machine: confirm STOP and wait for all drives to come to a complete halt.
Visually inspect the wire path and break location (guides, pulleys, winding).
Remove wire residue from hazardous areas (guides, rollers, spool).
Check tension setting (Tension_N) and look for mechanical damage.
Re-thread the wire according to standard path; verify attachment to the spool.
Start slowly (low LineSpeed_mpm) and monitor Tension_N + SpoolRPM for 1–2 minutes.
If E204 recurs, reduce speed and escalate to maintenance (possible damage to guides/pulleys).
body: The goal is to minimize repeated wire breaks and safely restore operation.
